articles.author: Adrian Wojnarowski
articles.title: Sources -- Ben Simmons' agent meets with Philadelphia 76ers, but sides no closer to resolution - ESPN India
articles.description: Ben Simmons is no closer to honoring the Sixers' hopes for a return to the court this season -- and Philly's steep asking price has brought the All-Star guard no closer to a potential trade, sources told ESPN's Adrian Wojnarowski on Wednesday.
articles.content: With the NBA trade deadline a month away, Ben Simmons' agent -- Klutch Sports CEO Rich Paul -- met with Philadelphia 76ers president of basketball operations Daryl Morey and general manager Elton Bra… [+1761 chars]
